post.body: hadn't re-followed @turoczy & I only see @ replies 4 people I follow so didn't catch ur "baby carrot" ref. lol. u gonna B @ ignite5?
sent another email. clearly the wrong communication mode. how late does party go?
INTERESTING! happy new year to you and yours!
you mean you could work there every day? in the cafeteria?
glad you finally got the package. I was on the edge of my seat. (I know that sounds sarcastic, but I am serious.)
congrats on new job! :D
Omg, I love it all. Yes, give it a try. Also, have you seen Red Eye? It was written by the guy who wrote disturbia. VERY good!
thanks for the reminder about ravenme! I forgot too!
says happy new year!
happy to be at melissa's, rum is yummy, and my email is down to 34 from above 80 this morning. yay. happy new year! :)
says, ok I am outta here. over to melissa's where the drinking will commence! yay!
is singing a little song called "I hate email." feel free to sing along.
has run 4 million errands. and now she remembers why she doesn't run errands. can the drinking begin now?
says that in the end, it was the theme from Caddyshack ("I'm Alright") that got her out of bed this morning.
is up. thanks to Eagle Eye (great new movie she saw last night), she dreamt odd dreams all night. #badsleeper
is gonna watch some sports night ("dear louise") and go to bed. :D
just got done watching Eagle Eye, the latest D. J. Caruso movie (who brought us Disturbia, etc). She *HIGHLY* recommends it.
has worked a lot & been very productive & now she will go run errands (a whole different kind of productivity) wende is *such* a good person
giggles at her office colleague who describes everything in terms of hate and starts Princess Bride movie quote trivia games
thinks its very funny that she came 2 office 2 work w/people & is working behind a closed door so she can watch a movie--just like @ home
